sentences.en: At last it became too tiring.
sentences.cn: 后来那事情变得太使人厌倦了.

sentences.en: But somehow I seem to get tired even when I don't do anything tiring.
sentences.cn: 然而我的精神不费也等于费的.

sentences.en: I found it tiring to begin with but I soon got used to it.
sentences.cn: 刚开始时我觉得很累,不过很快就适应了.

sentences.en: It had been a long and tiring day.
sentences.cn: 这是漫长而又累人的一天。

sentences.en: It had been a long tiring day.
sentences.cn: 这一天让人感到又累又长。

sentences.en: It seems to ease all the aches and pains of a hectic and tiring day.
sentences.cn: 繁忙劳碌了一天所带来的周身酸痛似乎被一扫而空。
那是件累人但不用动脑筋的工作.

sentences.en: Let's lay off for a few minutes, this work is tiring.
sentences.cn: 我们休息一会儿吧, 这活儿太累了.

sentences.en: Looking after pre-school children is very tiring.
sentences.cn: 照顾学龄前的孩子非常辛苦。

sentences.en: Ma, you don't have to be afraid it's too tiring for me! Don't worry!
sentences.cn: 妈! 不要怕我辛苦, 不要怕!

sentences.en: Nothing quite beats the luxury of soaking in a long, hot bath at the end of a tiring day.
sentences.cn: 辛苦一天之后美美地泡个热水澡比什么都强。

sentences.en: Teaching can be a tiring and stressful job.
sentences.cn: 当教师是件辛苦紧张的工作.

sentences.en: We’ve all had a long tiring day.
sentences.cn: 我们大家都经历了漫长而劳累的一天。

sentences.en: You have had a hectic [ tiring ] day.
sentences.cn: 你们 辛苦 了一整天.

words.tran_cn: 烦人的，无聊的；令人讨厌的
不知疲倦地；不屈不挠地
疲倦；对…腻烦（tire的过去分词形式）
累人的；麻烦的；无聊的；引起疲劳的

phrases.tran_cn: 没精打采；漏了气的车胎
胎压；轮胎气压；轮胎压力
轮胎面；汽车外带；车轮踏面
卡车轮胎；载重汽车轮胎

trans.tran_en: making you feel that you want to sleep or rest
